title: $:/plugins/kixam/timeline
author: kixam
name: timeline
description: vis.js Timeline plugin for TiddlyWiki5, based on vis-timeline version 5.1.0
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/kixam/TW5-visjsTimeline">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/kixam/TW5-visjsTimeline"/></$button>

! vis.js Timeline

A timeline plugin for [[TiddlyWiki|http://tiddlywiki.com]] 5, using [[vis.js|http://visjs.org]].

---

Continued from [[emkay's plugin|https://github.com/emkayonline/tw5visjs]].

Provides [[vis-timeline|https://github.com/visjs/vis-timeline]], and integrates the Timeline object.

Depends on [[hammer.js plugin|https://github.com/kixam/TW5-hammer.js]] and [[moment.js plugin|https://github.com/kixam/TW5-moment.js]], which are available, along with installation instructions, on the [[demo site|http://kixam.github.io/TW5-visjsTimeline]].
